programme.title: Fight Sports: UFC Fight Night 2025
programme.desc: Λας Βέγκας, ΗΠΑ. Το καράτε ανταγωνίζεται το κουνγκ φου και το μποξ το ζίου ζίτσου. Το κικ μποξ έρχεται αντιμέτωπο με το τζούντο και η πάλη με το μάι τάι. Η 'μάχη' μεταξύ των πολεμικών τεχνών και η ανάδειξη του 'απόλυτου πρωταθλητή' μόνο στα κανάλια COSMOTE SPORT.

programme.title: Αυθεντικός Μαραθώνιος της Αθήνας 2025
programme.desc: Αγώνας Δρόμου 5χλμ COSMOTE TELEKOM 2025. Με αφετηρία το Μέγαρο Μποδοσάκη, οι δρομείς θα διασχίσουν το ιστορικό κέντρο της Αθήνας, τερματίζοντας στο Παναθηναϊκό Στάδιο. H COSMOTE TELEKOM είναι ο Μεγάλος Χορηγός του 42ου Μαραθωνίου της Αθήνας του Αυθεντικού και ονομαστικός χορηγός του φετινού Αγώνα Δρόμου 5 χλμ COSMOTE TELEKOM. Περιγραφή: Αντρέα Παλομπαρίνι, Γιώργος Θαναηλάκης.

programme.title: Santa Tell Me
programme.desc: A design show host finds a letter from Santa promising to meet her true love, a man named Nick, by Christmas Eve. Meeting three Nicks complicates her search.

programme.title: Christmas Above the Clouds
programme.desc: Eager to avoid Christmas, Ella Neezer, a CEO, books an international trip that skips the holiday, until three spirits journey Ella through her life to rediscover her Christmas spirit.

programme.title: A Newport Christmas
programme.desc: The charitable Ella heads out on a boat in 1905 and ends up in 2025. Nick has to figure out how to get her back in time and decide if their newfound love can stand the test of it.

programme.title: Christmas Under Wraps
programme.desc: After unexpectedly moving to Alaska, an ambitious doctor starts a new romance and learns that her small town is hiding a holiday secret.

programme.title: Small Town Christmas
programme.desc: Nell's last stop on a nationwide book tour takes her to Springdale, the hometown of Emmett, a young man she met while both were junior copy editors at a New York publishing company.

programme.title: Holiday Mismatch
programme.desc: New retiree Barb joins a Holiday Committee but clashes with long standing member Kath. When they realize their kids have started dating, they conspire to break up the happy couple.

programme.title: A Shoe Addict's Christmas
programme.desc: Department store employee Noelle visits Christmases of past, present and future as her guardian angel helps her navigate her wishes for a connection with her father, her dream career and love.

programme.title: November Christmas
programme.desc: A community works together to help a couple bring an early Christmas to their sick 8-year-old daughter (Emily Alyn Lind).

programme.title: Christmas on My Mind
programme.desc: Lucy Lovett wakes up holding a wedding dress and assumes she is about to marry the love her life, Zach Callahan.

programme.title: A Royal Montana Christmas
programme.desc: Overwhelmed by her royal duties, Princess Victoria visits Big Sky Country for Christmas and meets her dashing guide at the ranch. She must decide if love is worth leaving her royal life behind.

programme.title: Time for Us to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Five guests are mysteriously invited to an inn to celebrate Christmas and soon investigate their connection to each other.

programme.title: Crown for Christmas
programme.desc: After getting fired from her job as a maid at a ritzy New York City hotel, a woman accepts a temporary job as governess to a young girl who is part of a powerful European family.

programme.title: Christmas Above the Clouds
programme.desc: Eager to avoid Christmas, Ella Neezer, a CEO, books an international trip that skips the holiday, until three spirits journey Ella through her life to rediscover her Christmas spirit.

programme.title: A Keller Christmas Vacation
programme.desc: A trio of reluctant adult siblings join their parents on a Christmas river cruise through Europe, each dealing with personal issues, only to find unexpected joy, romance, and family bonds along the journey.

programme.title: Rocky Mountain Christmas
programme.desc: Sarah heads to her uncle's ranch to escape New York and the spotlight from a breakup. Returning home for the first time since her aunt passed, complications arise when Graham, a Hollywood star, arrives at the ranch to prepare for his next film.

programme.title: Christmas at Grand Valley
programme.desc: Kelly returns to Grand Valley for Christmas. When Leo, a single dad, arrives in town with his kids to review a hotel, the two cross paths. As Kelly re-experiences traditions with Leo, she begins to find her way back to her passion for art.

programme.title: One Royal Holiday
programme.desc: When Anna offers a stranded mother and son shelter from a blizzard, she learns that they are the royal family of Galwick and that they are both in need of a little Christmas magic.

programme.title: Where Are You, Christmas?
programme.desc: Addy wishes for a year without Christmas and wakes up in a black-and-white world. She must work together with the town mechanic to restore the holiday to all its glory.

programme.title: Good Morning Christmas!
programme.desc: Two squabbling TV hosts travel to a small town over Christmas, and while pretending to get along for the sake of appearances, they slowly discover there is more to each other than they thought.

programme.title: A Magical Christmas Village
programme.desc: A woman tells her young granddaughter, Chloe, that her miniature Christmas village can magically grant holiday wishes. As Chloe begins setting up the figurines, real-life events seem to mimic the scenes she creates.

programme.title: Time for Them to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: A woman with amnesia catches a ride with her handsome nurse to investigate the only clue to her identity: a newspaper clipping for a Christmas festival with a cryptic invitation.

programme.title: Sugarplummed
programme.desc: When Emily wishes for a perfect Christmas like the ones found in the popular Sugarplum movies, she's shocked when Sugarplum herself appears to help her fulfill it.

programme.title: Coyote Creek Christmas
programme.desc: An event planner discovers Christmas magic with a charming father-son duo while throwing a themed Christmas party at her family's inn.

programme.title: Long Lost Christmas
programme.desc: Hayley is an interior designer who plans to surprise her recently widowed mother with the perfect holiday present -- the extended family she knows her mom yearns for.

programme.title: This Time Each Year
programme.desc: Despite a trial separation, Lauren pretends to still be with her husband, Kevin, to placate her overbearing mother. The ruse may be just what the couple needs to finally work on their marriage.

programme.title: Finding Mr. Christmas
programme.desc: The hunks get personal while building gingerbread houses, sharing what Christmas means to them; Alison Sweeney joins as they saddle up for a cowboy scene, where animal co-stars lead to some unexpected performances.

programme.title: Baked With Love: Holiday
programme.desc: With each team given a lyric from "The 12 Days of Christmas," the ovens are going full tilt to turn out 12 perfect cupcakes; families trifle with lots of lush layers to create showstoppers for the holiday table.

programme.title: A Christmas Tree Grows in Colorado
programme.desc: A woman who is in charge of her town's Christmas celebration must win over a firefighter to obtain a magnificent spruce tree from his property for the festivities.

programme.title: Christmas Bells Are Ringing
programme.desc: Samantha, a freelance photographer, is returning to Cape Cod for the first time since the death of her mother years earlier. Having never been to the Cape during winter, she finds that it is a whole new experience than her many summers spent there.

programme.title: A Season for Family
programme.desc: Maddy's adopted son, Wesley, has just one wish for Christmas -- to meet his brother, Cody, who was adopted into a different family. Circumstances soon bring the two siblings together while sparks fly between their respective parents.

programme.title: Debbie Macomber's Joyful Mrs. Miracle
programme.desc: Mrs. Miracle uses Christmas magic to reunite three siblings who must decide who will inherit the family's real estate empire, following their grandmother's passing.

programme.title: Just in Time for Christmas
programme.desc: A young psychology professor has to choose between marrying her longtime beau or accepting a once-in-a-lifetime job. To help her make a decision, a magical messenger lets her see both possible futures so she'll be able to make the right decision.

programme.title: Angel Falls: A Novel Holiday
programme.desc: Book editor Hannah must work with former rival Ryan to help a potential writer find her way, and Angel Anthony reminds them about Christmas spirit and the value of community.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas: Second Chance, First Love
programme.desc: After 15 years, a single father moves home from Hawaii with his two sons and, through a series of coincidences -- or Godwinks, ends up stuck in traffic next to his high school sweetheart.

programme.title: A Season for Miracles
programme.desc: A woman (Carla Gugino) tries to save her sister's (Laura Dern) children from foster care by taking them to a small town where she is mistaken for a missing heiress.

programme.title: Holiday for Heroes
programme.desc: After a year's worth of letters exchanged between Audrey Brown and soldier Matt Evans, their worlds collide for the first time off the page.

programme.title: Christmas Homecoming
programme.desc: A military widow whose faith in Christmas has lapsed rents an apartment to a soldier who is recovering from an injury in battle. When they team up to save the town's military museum, these two wounded birds find themselves falling in love.

programme.title: The Christmas Note
programme.desc: Gretchen returns to her hometown and meets her neighbor Melissa. They form a reluctant friendship when Melissa discovers she has a sibling she never knew about, and through their detective work, they uncover a huge surprise.

programme.title: Once Upon a Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: Told she would have less than a few months to live without a new liver, Heather's time was running out when a kind stranger heard of her plight and discovered he was a perfect match. The two met and before long a friendship developed into romance.

programme.title: The Christmas Quest
programme.desc: An archeologist and her ex-husband, an expert in ancient Norse languages, are sent to Iceland at Christmastime to search for the legendary treasure of the Yule Lads.

programme.title: A Fabled Holiday
programme.desc: Talia and her childhood best friend unexpectedly reunite in a curiously familiar-looking town that's full of Christmas spirit.

programme.title: The Christmas Ring
programme.desc: Reporter Kendra Adams searches for the love story behind an antique engagement ring with the help of the grandson of the ring's owner.

programme.title: Christmas on Honeysuckle Lane
programme.desc: After their parents pass, siblings agree to sell their family home, leaving Emma in charge. While Emma's mother's collection is being appraised, they find a hidden surprise that helps them discover the power of love and family during the holidays.

programme.title: Undercover Holiday
programme.desc: Returning home for the holidays, pop star Jaylen tells her protective family that Matt is her new beau, when in reality, he's her overzealous security guard.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas: Meant for Love
programme.desc: A chance meeting at a weekend wedding celebration brings together Alice and Jack, two singles from very different family backgrounds.

programme.title: Swept Up by Christmas
programme.desc: An antique seller and a cleaner clash as they work on downsizing a magnificent estate. As the two uncover the house's treasures, they find a way to reconnect the reclusive owner with his Christmas past.

programme.title: Merry Matrimony
programme.desc: After landing her dream job, a woman must work with her ex-boyfriend to organize a wedding for a fashion magazine.

programme.title: The Santa Suit
programme.desc: A corporate bigwig (Kevin Sorbo) learns valuable lessons when Santa Claus transforms him into his look-alike.

programme.title: Ms. Christmas Comes to Town
programme.desc: After receiving a terminal diagnosis, a shopping channel host known as Ms. Christmas embarks on a multi-city excursion to spread holiday cheer before her farewell broadcast.

programme.title: A Gingerbread Romance
programme.desc: An architect begins to find herself longing for a place to call her own as she works alongside a baker to win a gingerbead house contest.

programme.title: Christmas Scavenger Hunt
programme.desc: When Belinda heads to her hometown for the holidays, things get complicated when she is forced to team up with her ex-boyfriend Dustin for the town's annual Christmas scavenger hunt.

programme.title: A Royal Christmas Crush
programme.desc: Ava accepts the opportunity of a lifetime to work at the Royal Ice Hotel, which leads to a surprise whirlwind romance with the most important guest of all, the prince himself.

programme.title: Time for You to Come Home for Christmas
programme.desc: Katherine returns home after her husband passes and meets a veteran who is on his holiday journey. As Christmas nears, they learn of a bond that may be the miracle they need.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: During Harry's fourth year at Hogwarts a competition will be held between three schools of wizardry, and contestants will be magically chosen for the very dangerous event.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: A summer has passed since Harry's encounter with the Dark Lord. With the wizard community in peril the future of magic may depend on Harry and a secret society known as The Order of the Phoenix.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: While Death Eaters emboldened by the return of Lord Voldemort wreak havoc in both the Muggle and Wizarding worlds, Harry suspects new dangers lie within Hogwarts.

programme.title: The Cabin in the Woods
programme.desc: Two unseen scientists manipulate the gory goings-on at a backwoods cabin inhabited by a group of unsuspecting college friends (Kristen Connolly, Chris Hemsworth, Anna Hutchison).

programme.title: Learn More About Medicare Advantage Plans from Humana
programme.desc: Are you making the most of your Medicare coverage? In this program you will learn about the variety of Humana Medicare plans designed to fit your needs, your lifestyle, and your budget.

programme.desc: Trusted brand Jacuzzi Bath Remodel and interior designer Christina Hall share their secrets on how you can easily and affordably transform your bathroom into a gorgeous custom, safe, stylish space in 1 day! Call for a FREE quote & installation.

programme.desc: Španska košarkaška ACB liga osnovana je 1957. godine kao "Liga National". U ligi sudeluje 18 ekipa prema dvokružnom sistemu takmičenja.

programme.title: Pregled Evrolige
programme.desc: 18 najboljih timova Evrope ponovo se bore za titulu najboljeg na kontinentu. EFES je zasluženo uzeo titulu prošle sezone, a čini se da će imati nikada teži zadatak da je odbrane. Mogu li Zvezda i...

programme.title: Odbojka - Poljska liga (ž): Opole - Mielec
programme.desc: Uživajte uz utakmice najvišeg ranga ženskog, ligaškog takmičenja u Poljskoj na kom učestvuju najbolji odbojkaški klubovi ove zemlje. (LIVE).

programme.title: Košarka - Eurocup: Pregled
programme.desc: Drugo po težini takmičenje u evropskoj klubskoj košarci sigurno zavređuje pažnju ljubitelja košarke. Iako je pomalo u senci Evrolige, Evrokup nudi obilje iznenađenja i kvalitetne košarke.

programme.title: Pregled portugalske lige
programme.desc: Osnovana 1934. kao probni projekat, portugalska liga je četiri godine kasnije dobila i svoju službenu verziju nazvanu Primeira. U današnjem sistemu liga broji 18 ekipa gde svaka ekipa igra po jednu...

programme.title: Odbojka - Poljska liga (ž): LKS Lodz - Mogilno
programme.desc: Uživajte uz utakmice najvišeg ranga ženskog, ligaškog takmičenja u Poljskoj na kom učestvuju najbolji odbojkaški klubovi ove zemlje. (LIVE).

programme.title: Fudbal: Turska liga - Pregled
programme.desc: Pogledajte najbolje momente sa utakmica Turske lige, takmičenja osnovanog 1958. godine u kom je najviše titula osvajala ekipa Galatasaraja.

programme.title: Fudbal - Turska liga: Antalya - Besiktas
programme.desc: Turska Superliga je najviša profesionalna liga Turske u fudbalu. Ova liga osnovana je 1957. godine.

programme.title: Odbojka - Poljska liga (ž): Bydgoszcz - Bielsko Biala
programme.desc: Uživajte uz utakmice najvišeg ranga ženskog, ligaškog takmičenja u Poljskoj na kom učestvuju najbolji odbojkaški klubovi ove zemlje.

programme.title: Fudbal - Saudijska liga: Ittihad - Ahli
programme.desc: Pratite Saudijsku profesionalnu ligu, najvišu fudbalsku ligu u ligaškom sistemu Saudijske Arabije. Osnovana je 1976. godine kao prva profesionalna fudbalska liga Kraljevine Saudijske Arabije.

programme.title: Biciklizam - Kriterijum Saitama
programme.desc: Pratite biciklističku trku Saitama Criterium, koja se održava 6. novembra 2022. godine u Saitami u Japanu. Ovo takmičenje se održava od 2013. godine u organizaciji Saitama Sports Commissiona. (LIVE).

programme.title: Zlatni momenti YU sporta
programme.desc: Momenti koji su obeležili bogatu istoriju jugoslovenskog sporta.

programme.title: Rukomet - Mađarska liga: Pick Szeged - Veszprem
programme.desc: Počeci najvažnije rukometne lige u Mađarskoj sežu iz 1951. Održava se pod pokroviteljstvom Mađarske rukometne federacije i jedna je od najjačih u Evropi.

programme.title: Košarka - NBA liga: Atlanta - LA Lakers
programme.desc: NBA liga je najcenjenije svetsko košarkaško takmičenje u kojem 30 severnoameričkih ekipa svake jeseni kreće u lov na prsten namenjen NBA prvaku.

programme.title: Košarka - Španska liga: Girona - Barcelona
programme.desc: Španska košarkaška ACB liga osnovana je 1957. godine kao "Liga National". U ligi sudeluje 18 ekipa prema dvokružnom sistemu takmičenja. (LIVE).

programme.title: Legende Košarke
programme.desc: Upoznajte legendarne ličnosti koje su obeležile istoriju košarke ostavivši neizbrisiv trag u svetu sporta.

programme.title: Odbojka - Poljska liga: Lublin - Belchatow
programme.desc: Pratimo mečeve najvišeg ranga odbojkaškog takmičenja u Poljskoj! Ova liga je svrstana među najbolje odbojkaške lige u Evropi, a u njoj se za svoje mesto bore najbolji klubovi te zemlje. (LIVE).

programme.title: Idealna putanja
programme.desc: Ceo život, vozači Formule 1 traže tu "idealnu putanju". Kako doći do nje i kako napraviti savršeni set-ap bolida i koliko vremena oduzima sve to, saznaćete u ovoj emisiji.

programme.title: SK STUDIO: Najava utrke
programme.desc: Pre i posle svih važnih događaja koje prenosi Sport Klub, naši stručnjaci će vam dati sve neophodne informacije. Nećete ostati uskraćeni ni za jedan zanimljiv detalj o najvažnijim sportskim događajima...

programme.title: F1 Brazil: TRKA
programme.desc: Pratite uzbudljivu akciju najboljih vozača Formule 1 na pisti Jose Carlos Pace u Sao Paulu. (LIVE).

programme.title: SK Momenti
programme.desc: Suze, znoj i smeh, sve je to sastavni deo sporta. A najbolji sport je uvek bio i uvek će biti na najboljem klubu...

programme.title: Odbojka - Poljska liga (ž): Wroclaw - Budowlani Lodz
programme.desc: Uživajte uz utakmice najvišeg ranga ženskog, ligaškog takmičenja u Poljskoj na kom učestvuju najbolji odbojkaški klubovi ove zemlje. (LIVE).

programme.desc: Španska košarkaška ACB liga osnovana je 1957. godine kao "Liga National". U ligi sudeluje 18 ekipa prema dvokružnom sistemu takmičenja.

programme.title: Fudbal - Bundesliga: Eintracht - Mainz
programme.desc: Fudbalska Bundesliga najviši je rang takmičenje u Nemačkoj koja od 1963. godine i svog osnutka visokom kvalitetom igre oduševljava sve fudbalske poklonike širom sveta.

programme.title: Košarka - Grčka liga: Olympiacos - Karditsa
programme.desc: Pratite prenose Grčke lige, prestižnog takmičenja čije je prvo izdanje održano u sezoni 1927/1928. Takmičenje svake sezone okuplja 12 klubova, a ubedljivo najuspešnija ekipa od osnivanja lige je...

programme.title: Moto2 Portugal: TRKA
programme.desc: Do sada smo videli dosta neočekivanih rezultata u Moto2 klasi. Sada su timovi imali vremena da probaju da poprave šta nije u redu i poredak bi mogao da bude dosta drugačiji.

programme.title: Moto GP Portugal: TRKA
programme.desc: Po svemu sudeći, očekuje nas još jedna izuzetno neizvesna sezona u kraljevskoj klasi. Prva trka u Evropi bi mogla da se ispostavi kao veoma važna.

programme.title: Moto3 Portugal: TRKA
programme.desc: Ove sezone, među popularnim zujalicama smo videli zanimljive trke, ali i dosta sudara. Nadajmo se da nas u Portimau očekuje samo ono prvo.

programme.title: Trans World Sport
programme.desc: Interesantne priče i neobični sportovi iz svih delova sveta. Uvek ćete biti u toku uz ovu emisiju.

programme.title: Rally Qassim: Pregled

programme.title: Košarka - Španska liga: Joventut - Real Madrid
programme.desc: Španska košarkaška ACB liga osnovana je 1957. godine kao "Liga National". U ligi sudeluje 18 ekipa prema dvokružnom sistemu takmičenja.

programme.desc: Koledž fudbal je američki fudbal koji igraju timovi sportista-studenata u okviru američkih koledža, univerziteta i vojnih akademija. Univerzitetski fudbal je jedna stepenica niže u odnosu na...

programme.desc: Popularna "Cvajta" čini se, nikada nije bila jača. Ko će se od velikana vratiti u prvu ligu? Mesta je malo a kandidata mnogo.

programme.desc: Švajcarska Super liga pod tim nazivom se vodi od 2003. godine, dok je prvi prvak okrunjen davne 1898. Prvi prvak i najuspješniji klub sa čak 27 titule je Grasshopper Club Zürich.

programme.title: Košarka - Australijska liga: South East Melbourne - Melbourne
programme.desc: Nema boljeg načina da se počne dan nego uz australijsku košarku. Uzeli su medalju na Olimpijskim igrama, hale su pune i napreduju iz godine u godinu.

programme.title: Košarka - Izraelska liga: Netanya - Maccabi

programme.title: Pregled Evrolige
programme.desc: 18 najboljih timova Evrope ponovo se bore za titulu najboljeg na kontinentu. EFES je zasluženo uzeo titulu prošle sezone, a čini se da će imati nikada teži zadatak da je odbrane. Mogu li Zvezda i...

programme.title: Sudar u Sepangu - 10 godina kasnije
programme.desc: Dokumentarni film o sudaru Valentina Rosija i Marka Markesa, koji je 2015. godine šokirao sve ljubitelje motociklizma. Deset godina kasnije, autori rasvetljavaju ovaj slučaj kroz arhivske snimke,...

programme.title: Fudbal - Bugarska liga: Slavia - Montana
programme.desc: Od 1948. godine bugarski klubovi bore se za titulu najboljeg u zemlji. Trenutno u ligi nastupa 14 klubova, koji se bore za prvo mesto i nastup u kvalifikacijama Lige šampiona. (LIVE).

programme.title: Fudbal - Bundesliga 2: Braunschweig - Bochum
programme.desc: Popularna "Cvajta" čini se, nikada nije bila jača. Ko će se od velikana vratiti u prvu ligu? Mesta je malo a kandidata mnogo. (LIVE).

programme.title: Moja priča & Galerija slavnih
programme.desc: Moja priča & Galerija slavnih.

programme.title: Košarka - Litvanska liga: Rytas - Jonavos
programme.desc: U ovoj zemlji, košarka je religija. Žalgiris je "dežurni krivac", ali nikada ne otpisujte klubove kao što su Ritas i Lijetkabelis. (LIVE).

programme.title: SK Mix
programme.desc: Najbolji, najsmešniji, najčudniji, sve što ima veze sa superlativima videćete u ovom specijalnom kolažu. I verujte, neće vam biti dovoljno da ga odgledate samo jednom...

programme.title: Fudbal - Grčka liga: Panathinaikos - PAOK
programme.desc: Voli se fudbal u Grčkoj i svaki duel, pogotovo derbi, doživljava se sa mnogo strasti. Olimpijakos jeste favorit za titulu, ali AEK, PAOK i večiti rival Panatinaikos kucaju na vrata... (LIVE).
